I don't see how you can't beat yasuo with ahri. Not much people will even be able to flawlessly play yasuo; vs ahri, 1 flaw = 1 charm

You might find Yasuo easy with Ahri, but I don't know man, might be a personal thing, but I hate that matchup with all my heart and soul. 
-Ahri is extremely skillshot reliant, Yasuo has the best mobility in the game in laning phase.
-Yasuo has great trading since he can dash in and get back out really easily without taking any return damage and since Ahri is so skillshot reliant, he can just either dash back out through minions so Charm won't hit him, or dodge Q using minions.
-Literally every single bit of damage that Ahri puts out is from projectiles =WIndwall
-Poking with Autos or Q's isn't as effective on Yasuo as it is on other Melee champions because of his shield.

if you're a decent ahri, you could charm him mid dash, if he dashes through you, then an easy backward charm would get him [he can't curve his dash, you know exactly where he'll end up]. His wind shield can only block 1 auto to protect his shield anyway
If you want to get rid of yasuo then pick {{champion:17}}
Ban him then...
